column1: Chase the Flag, Shape the Victory - Grit and Brilliance are the tools

column2: '>Welcome to our CTF competition! Please review the following rules to ensure a smooth and fair experience for everyone.

column1: • Eligibility: Open to individuals only. No teams allowed
• Respect: Treat everyone with respect. Harassment of any form is prohibited.
• Fair Play: Don’t disrupt the competition or interfere with others.
• Registration: Use your real name and email address. If your username or email is unrecognizable, you may be disqualified.
• Outside Help: No external assistance allowed during the competition.
• Flags: Each challenge has one or more flags. Don’t share or post flags outside. Doing so will lead to disqualification.
• Logging: Platform activity is monitored. Suspicious behavior may lead to disqualification.
• Scoring: Points are based on challenge difficulty. The leaderboard updates in real-time.
• Points: Points are awarded on a ""first-solve"" basis, with more points given to the fastest solvers. Each subsequent solve will yield slightly fewer points, rewarding quicker solutions.
• Prizes: Top scorers and winners will be contacted post-event.
• Scope: Do not exploit outside the challenge scope.
• Prohibited Tools: Avoid DDoS attacks or actions that disrupt others.
• Report Issues: Notify organizers of any bugs or issues without exploiting them.
• Rule Violations: Breaking rules may result in disqualification.
• Integrity: Organizers reserve the right to disqualify any disruptive participant at their discretion.
By participating in this CTF, you agree to follow these rules. Good luck, and enjoy the competition!
